title: Silver ADC LFT/ Dynamic 5's
body: S3, I main Jhin, Kallista and Corki. I have a mic, a fair amount of game knowledge and such, hoping to get plat this season, looking for a good group to play with.

replies.body: id be interested was s3 dropped a bit today it would be nice to have teammates that know when to play safe. im still silver i do make bad decisions but i understand the game well enough
